      public ResponsePostDTO createPost(RequestPostDTO requestPostDTO, List<org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile> images, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Description copied from interface: PostService
      Creates a new post with the given request data, images, and authentication.
      Specified by:
      createPost in interface PostService
      Parameters:
      requestPostDTO - The DTO containing the post data.
      images - The list of images associated with the post.
      authentication - The authentication object for the current user.
      Returns:
      The DTO representing the created post.

    • updatePost

      public ResponsePostDTO updatePost(RequestPostDTO requestPostDTO, List<org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile> images, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication) throws PostNotFoundException
      Description copied from interface: PostService
      Updates an existing post with the given request data, images, and authentication.
      Specified by:
      updatePost in interface PostService
      Parameters:
      requestPostDTO - The DTO containing the updated post data.
      images - The list of images associated with the post.
      authentication - The authentication object for the current user.
      Returns:
      The DTO representing the updated post.
      Throws:
      PostNotFoundException - If the post with the given identifier is not found or Authors and User's data does not match.
